<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The raw.tbuffer and struct.tbuffer intrinsics have two offset args: offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (the offset that is included in bounds checking and swizzling, to be split</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between the instruction&#39;s voffset and immoffset fields) and soffset (the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// offset that is excluded from bounds checking and swizzling, to go in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction&#39;s soffset field).  This function takes the first kind of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// offset and figures out how to split it between voffset and immoffset.</span></CodeLine>
